com.oculusinfo.ml.stats

Class TrackClusterWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oculusinfo.ml.stats.TrackClusterWrapper

  • public class TrackClusterWrapper
extends Object
    This class takes a cluster of tracks, and compiles the various statistics etc. needed on it for actual use. It is meant to be used only after clustering is complete.
    Author:
    nathan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrackClusterWrapper(Cluster cluster) 
      TrackClusterWrapper(Collection<Cluster> clusters) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color getClusterColor() 
      String getClusterDescription()
      Gets a short description of this cluster, including name, number of members, length of mean, and standard deviation
      String getClusterName() 
      double getDistance(Track track) 
      Track getMean()
      Retrieves the mean of the cluster, as calculated from those tracks most towards the mean (@see setOutlierIgnoreRatio(double))
      double getStandardDeviation()
      Retrieves the standard deviation of this cluster from its mean, where the mean is calculated ignoring the furthest tracks from the mean.
      Map<String,StatTracker> getStatistics() 
      List<Track> getTracks()
      retrieves a list of all tracks in this cluster
      void setClusterColor(Color c) 
      void setClusterName(String name) 
      void setOutlierIgnoreRatio(double ratio)
      Causes the given proportion of tracks farthest from the true mean to be ignored when calculating the practical mean.

    • Method Detail

      • setOutlierIgnoreRatio

        public void setOutlierIgnoreRatio(double ratio)
        Causes the given proportion of tracks farthest from the true mean to be ignored when calculating the practical mean.
        Parameters:
        ratio - A number in the range [0.0, 1.0). Floor(proportion times number of tracks) will be ignored, so that at least one track is always used, so the practical mean is never null.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance(Track track)

      • getTracks

        public List<Track> getTracks()
        retrieves a list of all tracks in this cluster

      • getMean

        public Track getMean()
        Retrieves the mean of the cluster, as calculated from those tracks most towards the mean (@see setOutlierIgnoreRatio(double))

      • getStandardDeviation

        public double getStandardDeviation()
        Retrieves the standard deviation of this cluster from its mean, where the mean is calculated ignoring the furthest tracks from the mean.
